addQuickLink.description: Button or label for adding a new quick link on the start page

engineSettings.description: Label for the section where the user can configure the default search engine

vanishAnimation.description: Option to enable or configure an animation effect for disappearing elements

showClock.description: Option to enable clock in main dashboard

quickLinks.description: Option to enable QuickLinks in main dashboard

weatherWidget.description: Header or label related to weather features in the app

delete.description: Generic action to remove an item

save.description: Action button to confirm and save changes

address.description: Field label for entering a URL or physical address

name.description: Field label for entering a name or title

close.description: Action to close a dialog, modal, or window
